DOC.detailed_description: The investigator compare 2 different dos vaginal misoprostol , group ( 1 ) 200 ug , group ( 2 ) 400 ug , 3hours prior office hysteroscopy , Infertile patient , patient abnormal bleed patient recurrent abortion Outcome measure : pain score , easiness procedure , procedure time , complication
